name: lanparty-astro-game
description: Multiplayer space battle game with mobile controls

scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client && npm run copy:html
scripts.dev: npm run build && nodemon --watch src --ext ts,html --exec "npm run build && npm start"
scripts.dev:no-sleep: npm run build && caffeinate -i nodemon --watch src --ext ts,html --exec "npm run build && npm start"
